name: cy.png
descr: Export the current graph view as a PNG image.

fields.name: output
fields.descr: Whether the output should be `'base64uri'` (default), `'base64'`, `'blob'`, or `'blob-promise'` (a promise that resolves to the blob is returned).

fields.name: bg
fields.descr: The background colour of the image (transparent by default).

fields.name: full
fields.descr: Whether to export the current viewport view (`false`, default) or the entire graph (`true`).

fields.name: scale
fields.descr: This value specifies a positive number that scales the size of the resultant image.

fields.name: maxWidth
fields.descr: Specifies the scale automatically in combination with `maxHeight` such that the resultant image is no wider than `maxWidth`.

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.descr: Specifies the scale automatically in combination with `maxWidth` such that the resultant image is no taller than `maxHeight`.
